DOC.brief_summary: To visually evaluate retention coverage Test Product ( ) ( TP ) face exercise compare full coverage observe prior exercise
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Sunscreen During Exercise Under Conditions Profuse Sweating ( 821/2016 )
DOC.criteria: Subjects may male female , age 1855 year inclusive . Subjects must capable understand provide write informed consent . Subjects must sign write confidentiality agreement include photography release form . Subjects must good general health judge specify licensed physician , indicate suitability participate study . Subjects must receive use Investigational New Drug within last 30 day . Subjects must active participant another clinical subjective TP performance study within last 30 day unless authorized Sponsor . Subjects must know physical medical condition would preclude vigorous exercise Subjects must fiveminute rest pulse rate great 80 bpm .
